ygData.messageBody:
Errrr! Hehe. It is NOT possible to tank a spectre unless you have a cleric
in the group. One probable reason that you survived the spectre at level 19
was maybe the spectre was Ensnared, Darknessed or busy killing other victims
near you (that has saved me countless times before).
Okay, I might have exaggerated the part about the inability to tank a
spectre. You COULD tank a spectre in a party (assuming you have a really
good group), but you will be left with low health which is undesirable in a
party. The best strategy (even with a good group) is to run the spectre
around and allow your DoT to take it's effects and renew it until you are
out of mana. Then, and only then, should you engage into melee.


>should be able to layer on those spells with ease. Yes, we are tanks and
>who would want to solo a Spectre, thats why there are other people in your
>party. I was attacked by a Spectre at level 19 and lived to zone, was a
>pillar 2. Our spells help us a lot, but we are mostly tanks with mana bars
>and pets, at least with my experiences.
